pr_title: ISPN-11503 Export Rolling Upgrade operations via REST

timeline.message: ISPN-11503 Export Rolling Upgrade operations via REST
ISPN-11503 Export Rolling Upgrade operations via REST
ISPN-11503 Export Rolling Upgrade operations via REST

timeline.bodyText: So we will have access to other Infinispan Clusters from the console ?
timeline.author: karesti

replies.bodyText: If you get the server config from REST, those servers will be listed, but they are the servers configured in the remote store for a cache
replies.author: gustavonalle

replies.bodyText: and those servers are going to be shutdown after the rolling upgrade, not sure how useful it is
replies.author: gustavonalle
